title: goinstall can't use new Google Code paths with subversion (weekly 2012-12-22)
body:
Weekly 2012-12-22 changed how goinstall wants to look at repositories 
on code.google.com:

goinstall go-avltree.googlecode.com/svn/trunk 
go-avltree.googlecode.com/svn/trunk: download failed: unsupported 
import path; should be "code.google.com/p/go-avltree/trunk" ($GOPATH 
is not set) 

However, code.google.com does not support the other format when using 
Subversion: 

goinstall code.google.com/p/go-avltree/trunk 
code.google.com/p/go-avltree/trunk: download failed: exit status 1 
cd "/" && "svn checkout https://code.google.com/p/go-avltree
/home/ 
michael/go/src/pkg/code.google.com/p/go-avltree" 
svn: Server sent unexpected return value (405 Method Not Allowed) in 
response to OPTIONS request for 'https://code.google.com/p/go-avltree' 
 ($GOPATH is not set)
